artist: After Charles Eisen; Étienne Ficquet; Published by Charles Antoine Joubert
description: bust length portrait of man turned left and looking out at viewer, in an ornamental oval frame; at left distance is artist painting a portrait; at right distance is a finished portrait; an illustration to 'La vie des peintres flamands allemands et hollandois' by Descamp (Paris 1753-1763)

title: Portrait of François Mieris
